_header: For the love of Christ Jesu
Subjects: prayers, asked on behalf of scribes
_description: Appeal to readers to pray for scribe of added texts — one couplet

CamStJohn195.Transcription:
ffor the love of christe IesuPraye for hym that this forth
                    drue
